name: Baby numbers - Learn to count
description:
Baby numbers is an educational and fun game for children of early age. Kids can learn to recognize numbers from 1 to 9, with funny drawings and animations.

LEARN TO COUNT NUMBERS

A number with its corresponding pronunciation will appear on each screen with fun objects and figures. Thanks to this game, children will learn to associate the numbers to the corresponding quantities.

EVERY SCREEN IS A GAME

In addition to learning numbers, babies can play with the items that appear on each screen: a musical xylophone, animals, flowers, nature...

DIFFERENT LANGUAGES

Babies and children can listen and learn numbers in different languages such as English, Spanish, French, German and Italian.

GAME FEATURES

This app will help your baby develop partnership skills, tactile and fine motor.
Watch them learn the numbers while having fun playing.
* Easy navigation between games
* Easily manageable objects
* High quality graphics attractions
* Soft and stimulating sounds

FIND OUT MORE EDUCATIONAL GAMES
Edujoy has more than 50 games for children of all ages; from kindergarten to the elderly.
THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING US!
Thank you very much for playing Edujoy games. We love creating educational and fun games for you. If you have any suggestions or questions, feel free to send us your feedback or leave your comments.
